fields.advice: Drag the marker to the exact location of your appliance
fields.label: Exact appliance location

fields.advice: The destination IDs for this appliance
fields.html:
Show destinations within miles:
Drag destinations from the left list to the right list to add them to your configuration!
fields.label: Destinations

fields.advice: The URL of a custom stylesheet for this appliance
fields.label: Custom stylesheet

fields.advice: The timeout for the destination slide shows
fields.label: imageTimeout

fields.advice: The CloudMade Style ID for the preferred basemap
fields.label: CloudMade Style ID

fields.advice: An alternate tile URL for the basemap
fields.label: Alternate Tile URL

fields.advice: The attribution for the custom tile layer. Only honored if a custom tile URL is specified
fields.label: Basemap attribution

fields.advice: The maximum zoom level for the basemap. Default 16.
fields.label: Maximum Zoom Level
Content URL
fields.advice: A full HTML page - populate this OR Image URL, not both.

fields.label: Image URL
fields.advice: URL of image file to display - populate this OR Content URL, not both.

key.title: Transit Board™ Horizontal Split

fields.label: Banner Title
fields.advice: Will appear at top of display after the words: Transit Board for

fields.label: Font size:
fields.advice: Make fonts a little bigger or a little smaller - percentage value (e.g., 110 = 10% larger)

fields.label: Trip block size:
fields.advice: Make trip block a little bigger or a little smaller - percentage value (e.g., 110 = 10% larger)

fields.label: Logo:
fields.advice: URL path to optional logo to display

fields.label: Stylesheet:
fields.advice: URL path to optional custom stylesheet

fields.label: Car2Go vehicles:
fields.advice: Show this many of the nearest Car2Go vehicles

fields.label: Columns:
fields.advice: Number of columns to arrange arrivals in

fields.label: Suppress scrolling:
fields.advice: Disable display from scrolling beyond set of arrivals on initial screen

fields.label: Number of Pages:
fields.advice: Number of pages to rotate through

fields.label: Page Delay:
fields.advice: Seconds of delay between pages

fields.label: Suppress "Downtown Only" arrivals:
fields.advice: Suppress display of arrivals that include the string "Downtown Only"

fields.label: Reset:
fields.advice: Will cause the display to reload its configuration at the next status update interval

fields.label: Screen Margins:
fields.advice:
Some displays, particularly HDTVs, may display some content outside the visible area.
These options allow you to add margins to any edge of the display to adjust for this.

fields.label: Screen Split:
fields.advice: Horizontal portion of screen devoted to transit display (100 means no other info)

fields.label: Supplemental Info URL:
fields.advice: URL path to html page to be shown on right hand side of display

fields.label: Expert Options
fields.advice: Leave empty unless you know what this is for!

key.title: Transit Board™ Personal

fields.label: Number of Arrivals
fields.advice: The number of routes to cycle through, one per page. If there are more than n routes, the next n arrivals will be shown.

fields.label: Delay
fields.advice: The delay between changing slides (in seconds).

fields.label: Expert Options
fields.advice: Leave empty unless you know what this is for!

key.description: Displays a single line at a time, showing arrivals in the next 60 minutes. Cycles through the lines, one line per slide. Great for small displays.

key.title: TriMet Javascript Display
key.description: Similar to the displays on the Transit Mall
key.url_template: http://trimet.org/onsite/multi_stop_arrivals.html?locationIDs={eval}var stop_list = new Array;for (var stop_id in stops['TriMet']) {stop_list.push(stop_id)}; return stop_list.join(','){/eval}&${application.simple_option_string}&Route=true
key.form: Page Delay:Scroll Speed:
